mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN LEVEL-1 > 0 then CONCAT(CONCAT(REPEAT('', level - 1),' ã„´ '), ani.content) ELSE ani.content END AS content , ani.rid , ani.parent , fnc.level FROM (SELECT fnc_hierarchi() AS rid, @level AS level FROM (SELECT @start_with:=0, @rid:=@start_with, @level:=0) vars JOIN replyall WHERE @rid IS NOT NULL) fnc JOIN replyall ani ON fnc.rid = ani.rid;
